Vietnamese food.longDescription: Hot and sour Thai hot pot is a delicious weekend dish, for a family party. How to cook delicious and spicy Thai seafood hotpot at home will have a sweet and sour broth from lemongrass and chili, stimulating the taste buds, making it more appetizing. In particular, on cold days, sitting around a hot and sour Thai hot pot emitting a strong aroma is heartwarming. Immediately save the right way to cook Thai hot pot right here.
Vietnamese food.title: Hot and sour Thai hot pot
